attributes.action: Bring pressure to bear On Total (LOR) to source their contract labour from Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My GMB members (all engineering workers) are deeply concerned about Total(LOR)Immingham awarding a contract for a Sulphur Plant, to Italian company IREM. Who are fetching Italian and Portugese Labour to build this Plant.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
